description: Distributed prediction of visibilities from a sky model

parameters.info: Name of file containing the sky model. Default is 'sky-model.txt'
parameters.name: sky-model

parameters.info: Number of rows of input .MS that are processed in a single chunk. If zero, it will be automatically determined.
parameters.name: row-chunks

parameters.info: Number of sky model components that are processed in a single chunk. If 0 it will be set automatically
parameters.name: model-chunks

parameters.info: Optional. Model sources as non-flat spectra. The spectral coefficients and reference frequency must be present in the sky model.
parameters.name: spectra

parameters.info: Optional. Give JS9 region file. Only sources within those regions will be included.
parameters.name: within

parameters.info: Explicitly set the number of worker threads
parameters.name: num-workers

parameters.info: Fraction of system RAM that can be used. Used when setting automatically the chunk size.
parameters.name: memory-fraction

parameters.info: Comma-separated list of Field names or ids which should be predicted. All fields are predicted by default.
parameters.name: fields

parameters.info: Sign convention to use for the complex exponential. 'casa' specifies the e^(2.pi.I) convention while 'thompson' specifies the e^(-2.pi.I) convention in the white book and Fourier analysis literature. Defaults to 'casa'
parameters.name: exp-sign-convention
